azurerm_api_management_certificate.description: Manages an Certificate within an API Management Service.

name.description: The name of the API Management Certificate. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The Name of the API Management Service where this Service should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The Name of the Resource Group where the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

data.description: The base-64 encoded certificate data, which must be a PFX file. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

password.description: The password used for this certificate. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Certificate.

expiration.description: The Expiration Date of this Certificate, formatted as an RFC3339 string.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Certificate.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Certificate.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Certificate.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Certificate.
